lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve said industrial production fell 0.6 percent in March, more than expected and the biggest decline since August 2012.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Industrial Production Falls to Lowest Point Since 2009
headline.main: Oil’s Retreat Drives Down Industrial Output

snippet: The Federal Reserve said industrial production fell 0.6 percent in March, more than expected and the biggest decline since August 2012.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports that industrial production declined by 0.6 percent in March, largest drop since May 2009.
